host_since.desc: date when the host started to rent out

host_response_time.desc: how frequently host replies on platform

host_response_rate.desc: percent of host replies on platform

host_is_superhost.desc: whether host has more than one apartment to rent out

host_has_profile_pic.desc: whether host has profile picture on platform

host_identity_verified.desc: whether host has verified identity on platform

accommodates.desc: how many people can live in rent apartment

bathrooms.desc: number of bathrooms in rent apartment

bedrooms.desc: number of bedrooms in rent apartment

beds.desc: number of beds in rent apartment

guests_included.desc: number of possible guests in rent apartment

extra_people.desc: price for each extra people in rent apartment

minimum_nights.desc: minimum possible number of nights to rent in a row

maximum_nights.desc: maximum possible number of nights to rent in a row

review_scores_rating.desc: how good is the apartment, target variable for project

require_guest_profile_picture.desc: whether rent requires guest profile picture on platform
